TopicTitle: Space Shuttle Pack for ksp 1.0.4 dev thread

Articles.Content:
While the one piece arm (sorry I say that word too much) works and all, it doesnt have the features that romfarer has. 

Need to repack and compile as a plugin then run tests with unity. Wany to use romfarer instead
we are actually gonna start a dev thread for the real KSC in KSP. can I put a link to your mod in the thread? also you said you had some buildings

I need to go back and test it again. Between midterms and selling the house, i have not had much time. Though, i did have an epic battle in world of warships...

So, with the new shuttle I noticed that the ISS modules are just slightly too big sometimes to fit in the bay. I attempted to resize them on my own but I failed because of all the node connections that have to be adjusted as well. If someone or Mike could do a quick fix with this I'd greatly appreciate it.
